original_text: No! A true Jew is someone who belongs to God in his spirit. He belongs to God because God's Spirit has changed his life. It is like God has circumcised him in his spirit, not in his body. The rules in God's Law cannot do that work in a person. Other people may not praise a person like that, but God will praise him.
korean_text: 오직 이면적 유대인이 유대인이며 할례는 마음에 할지니 영에 있고 율법 조문에 있지 아니한 것이라 그 칭찬이 사람에게서가 아니요 다만 하나님에게서니라

sentences.original_text: A true Jew is someone who belongs to God in his spirit
sentences.korean_translation: 참된 유대인은 영으로 하나님께 속한 사람입니다

sentences.original_text: He belongs to God because God's Spirit has changed his life
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 하나님의 영이 그의 삶을 변화시켰기 때문에 하나님께 속합니다

sentences.original_text: It is like God has circumcised him in his spirit
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님이 그의 영에 할례를 행하신 것과 같습니다

sentences.original_text: The rules in God's Law cannot do that work in a person
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님의 법규들은 사람에게 그런 일을 할 수 없습니다

sentences.original_text: Other people may not praise a person like that
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 사람들은 그런 사람을 칭찬하지 않을 수 있습니다
